Parts.A: "I've not studied your page yet. Come back tomorrow."

Hello friend I am Irena, friend of Erik the Red and explorer.

  You must be so cold comming all the way up here...

  What can I do for you, friend?
Parts.B: I have this map here that brought me to this place, but I do not know why.
Parts.C: Just wanted to warm up a bit.

Parts.A: What map? Is this some sort of joke?
Parts.C: Oh, crud. It seems I left it back home... I will be back at another date.

Parts.A:
Aha!

  Now, this is not just a map. This is one of my friend Erik's lost logpages.
  Hm. Let me give you a little reward. This will be a good read, for sure!

  Report back to Erik. He recently rambled about relics and that he needs to gather some. Might be work for you.
"Just ring that gong, if you wish to get out. But be careful..it might madden the mammoths.."
